Name: Roepchand
description: Roepchand is a serious farmer and lives with his wife Maheshwari and child. He plants 14 acres of land and has inherited a tractor from his parents. He has recently refurbished his house with the profits he made with his farm over the past years. Roepchand has received eight loans from Seva MFi since 2009, varying between SRD 1.250 to SRD 10.000. These loans he repaid on time. Now he has approached Seva MFI for a new loan of SRD 10.000 for the purchase of fertilizers and pesticides.
